backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profile management with access control and a public contact form system storing timestamped submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record linking a landing page text update to the specific frontend file affected.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling of key frontend landing page components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground styles including dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the sole view.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Interactive contact form component handling validation, submission, and success UI with React state and custom hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Landing page contact section with location/info cards and embedded ContactForm.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with social links, branding, overlays, and external references including WhatsApp and Twitter.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section displaying the main title, tagline, updated banter phrasing, and CTA buttons with strong visual emphasis.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the landing page layout with a background image and sections like hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Displays a grid of tour feature cards with icons, titles, and descriptions under a themed section header.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Renders an individual review card with star rating, review text, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Shows a reviews section that maps curated reviews into ReviewCards and includes a TripAdvisor call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Exports a list of predefined customer reviews with IDs, ratings, reviewers, and excerpts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login flow, and state exposure to components.
Defines a mutation hook that submits contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, color variables, typography, and utility classes including text shadows and theme settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors, animations, and custom theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, feature info, and a pending request to update hero copy text.
